mapper.sql: A.GUID, A.ISEXTEND, A.FOLDERGUID, A.PRECEDENCE, A.OBJECTTYPE, A.OBJECTGUID, A.OPERREAD, A.OPERCREATE, A.OPERDELETE, A.OPERRENAME, A.OPERADDREF, A.OPERDELREF, A.CREATEUSERGUID, A.CREATETIME, A.UPDATEUSERGUID, A.UPDATETIME
mapper.select: SELECT FROM SA_ACL_FOLDER_LIBR A WHERE GUID = #GUID#
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SA_ACL_FOLDER_LIBR ( GUID, ISEXTEND, FOLDERGUID, PRECEDENCE, OBJECTTYPE, OBJECTGUID, OBJECTNAME, OPERREAD, OPERCREATE, OPERDELETE, OPERRENAME, OPERADDREF, OPERDELREF, CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME ) VALUES( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISEXTEND:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FOLDERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PRECEDENCE:INTEGER#, #OBJECTTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERREAD:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERCREATE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERDELETE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERRENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERADDREF:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERDELREF:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE SA_ACL_FOLDER_LIBR
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, ISEXTEND=#ISEXTEND#, FOLDERGUID=#FOLDERGUID#, PRECEDENCE=#PRECEDENCE#, OBJECTTYPE=#OBJECTTYPE#, OBJECTGUID=#OBJECTGUID#, OBJECTNAME=#OBJECTNAME#, OPERREAD=#OPERREAD# OPERCREATE=#OPERCREATE#, OPERDELETE=#OPERDELETE#, OPERRENAME=#OPERRENAME#, OPERADDREF=#OPERADDREF#, OPERDELREF=#OPERDELREF#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
